  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86869</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86869</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The pH scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die pH Skala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'échelle de pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escala do pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scala di pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλίμακα pH</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La escala del pH</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a pH scale. Acidity of substances increases when going to the left of the pH scale from 7 (neutral) and their alkalinity increases when going to the right of the pH scale from 7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pH</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht eine pH Skala. 
Säure der Substanzen erhöht sich beim Gehen auf der linken 
Seite der pH Skala von 7 (Neutrales) und ihrer Alkalinität Zunahmen 
beim Gehen auf der rechten Seite der pH Skala von 7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une échelle de pH. 
L'acidité des substances augmente en allant à la gauche de 
l'échelle de pH de 7 (point mort) et de leurs augmentations 
d'alcalinité en allant à la droite de l'échelle de pH de 
7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma escala do pH. O 
acidity das substâncias aumenta ao ir à esquerda da escala do pH de 
7 (ponto morto) e de seus aumentos do alkalinity ao ir à direita da 
escala do pH de 7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una scala di pH. 
L'acidità delle sostanze aumenta quando va alla sinistra della 
scala di pH da 7 (neutrale) e dei loro aumenti di alcalinità quando 
va alla destra della scala di pH da 7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια κλίμακα pH. Το
την η οξύτητα των ουσιών αυξάνεται κατά μετάβαση αριστερά της 
κλίμακας pH από 7 (ουδέτερος) και των αυξήσεων αλκαλικότητάς 
τους κατά μετάβαση δεξιά της κλίμακας pH από 7 (ουδέτερος).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una escala del pH. La
acidez de sustancias aumenta al ir a la izquierda de la escala del pH 
a partir del 7 (hilo neutro) y de sus aumentos de la alcalinidad al ir
a la derecha de la escala del pH a partir de la 7(neutral).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkalinität</string>
          </keyword>
